titleStmt.title: A letter written by a French gentleman to a friend of his at Rome conteyning a true report of the late treaty betweene the Queene Mother of France and King of Nauarre / faithfully translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: Thārư̄a Phānit Sattahīp (Thailand)
